Class SecurityConfigurationSection

Namespace
NuvTools.Security.AspNetCore.Configuration
Assembly
NuvTools.Security.AspNetCore.dll

Contains the mail configuration that should be loaded from appsettings file.

The default section name is "NuvTools.Security"
